650190.name: Fantasy Grounds - Iron Heroes Counter Collection (Token Pack)
650190.description:
Iron Heroes Counter Collection

4E Fantasy Token Pack
This token pack brings you every monster in the Iron Heroes Bestiary - including
counters for each class in the Iron Heroes Revised Core Book as well as multiple
representations of the 3 new character classes found in the Iron Heroes Player's
Companion. These tokens would fit in with any fantasy based RPG campaign.
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy
Ground II virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in
your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre and
product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your game.
Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32,
50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best
meets your needs.
This pack contains tokens for the following characters:
  • arcanist 01 (medium)
  • arcanist 02 (medium)
  • arcanist 03 (medium)

  • archer 02 (medium)

Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
